mapper.select: select *, row_number() over(order by reg_date) rownum from nam_keyword where item_idx = #{item_idx} order by rownum desc;

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS( SELECT A.MOVEMENT_IDX, A.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, A.STORAGE_NM, A.PARENT_CODE, A.STORAGE_NM AS LOCATION, A.STORAGE_TYPE, 1 AS lvl, A.SEQ, CONVERT(LPAD(CONVERT(A.SEQ, CHAR(4)), 4, '0'), CHAR(100)) AS SEQ_CHAR FROM(SELECT ns.MOVEMENT_IDX, ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, nsc.STORAGE_NM, nsc.PARENT_CODE, ns.STORAGE_TYPE, nsc.SEQ FROM nam_storage AS ns JOIN nam_storage_code AS nsc ON ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = nsc.STORAGE_CODE_IDX) AS A WHERE A.PARENT_CODE = 0 UNION ALL SELECT B.MOVEMENT_IDX, B.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, B.STORAGE_NM, B.PARENT_CODE, CONCAT(C.LOCATION, ',', B.STORAGE_NM) AS LOCATION, B.STORAGE_TYPE, C.lvl+1 AS lvl, B.SEQ, CONCAT(C.SEQ_CHAR, LPAD(CONVERT(B.SEQ, CHAR(4)), 4, '0')) AS SEQ_CHAR FROM CTE AS C JOIN (SELECT ns.MOVEMENT_IDX, ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, nsc.STORAGE_NM, nsc.PARENT_CODE, ns.STORAGE_TYPE, nsc.SEQ FROM nam_storage AS ns JOIN nam_storage_code AS nsc ON ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = nsc.STORAGE_CODE_IDX) AS B ON C.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = B.PARENT_CODE AND C.MOVEMENT_IDX = B.MOVEMENT_IDX AND C.STORAGE_TYPE = B.STORAGE_TYPE ) SELECT row_number() over(order by movement_date) as rownum, MOVEMENT_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'IN' THEN STORAGE_NM END) AS STORAGE_IN, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'OUT' THEN STORAGE_NM END) AS STORAGE_OUT, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'IN' THEN STORAGE_CODE_IDX END) AS STORAGE_IN_CODE_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'OUT' THEN STORAGE_CODE_IDX END) AS STORAGE_OUT_CODE_IDX, REQUESTER, ITEM_IDX, STORAGE_TYPE1_CODE_IDX, STORAGE_TYPE2_CODE_IDX, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_QTY, CURRENT_QTY, REQUESTER, REMARK, REG_USER, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT D.MOVEMENT_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(D.STORAGE_NM ORDER BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, D.SEQ_CHAR) AS STORAGE_NM, GROUP_CONCAT(D.STORAGE_CODE_IDX ORDER BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, D.SEQ_CHAR) AS STORAGE_CODE_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, nm.MOVEMENT_IDX as nmMovement_idx, nm.ITEM_IDX, nm.STORAGE_TYPE1_CODE_IDX, nm.STORAGE_TYPE2_CODE_IDX, nm.MOVEMENT_DATE, nm.MOVEMENT_QTY, nm.CURRENT_QTY, nm.REQUESTER, nm.REMARK, nm.REG_USER, nm.REG_DATE FROM (SELECT MOVEMENT_IDX, STORAGE_CODE_IDX, STORAGE_NM, PARENT_CODE, LOCATION, STORAGE_TYPE, lvl, SEQ, SEQ_CHAR FROM CTE) AS D JOIN nam_movement as nm on nm.MOVEMENT_IDX = D.movement_idx GROUP BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE) AS E WHERE item_idx = #{item_idx} GROUP BY MOVEMENT_IDX ORDER BY rownum desc;

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS( SELECT A.MOVEMENT_IDX, A.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, A.STORAGE_NM, A.PARENT_CODE, A.STORAGE_NM AS LOCATION, A.STORAGE_TYPE, 1 AS lvl, A.SEQ, CONVERT(LPAD(CONVERT(A.SEQ, CHAR(4)), 4, '0'), CHAR(100)) AS SEQ_CHAR FROM(SELECT ns.MOVEMENT_IDX, ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, nsc.STORAGE_NM, nsc.PARENT_CODE, ns.STORAGE_TYPE, nsc.SEQ FROM nam_storage AS ns JOIN nam_storage_code AS nsc ON ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = nsc.STORAGE_CODE_IDX) AS A WHERE A.PARENT_CODE = 0 UNION ALL SELECT B.MOVEMENT_IDX, B.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, B.STORAGE_NM, B.PARENT_CODE, CONCAT(C.LOCATION, ',', B.STORAGE_NM) AS LOCATION, B.STORAGE_TYPE, C.lvl+1 AS lvl, B.SEQ, CONCAT(C.SEQ_CHAR, LPAD(CONVERT(B.SEQ, CHAR(4)), 4, '0')) AS SEQ_CHAR FROM CTE AS C JOIN (SELECT ns.MOVEMENT_IDX, ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX, nsc.STORAGE_NM, nsc.PARENT_CODE, ns.STORAGE_TYPE, nsc.SEQ FROM nam_storage AS ns JOIN nam_storage_code AS nsc ON ns.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = nsc.STORAGE_CODE_IDX) AS B ON C.STORAGE_CODE_IDX = B.PARENT_CODE AND C.MOVEMENT_IDX = B.MOVEMENT_IDX AND C.STORAGE_TYPE = B.STORAGE_TYPE ) SELECT row_number() over(order by movement_date) as rownum, MOVEMENT_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'IN' THEN STORAGE_NM END) AS STORAGE_IN, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'OUT' THEN STORAGE_NM END) AS STORAGE_OUT, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'IN' THEN STORAGE_CODE_IDX END) AS STORAGE_IN_CODE_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE STORAGE_TYPE WHEN 'OUT' THEN STORAGE_CODE_IDX END) AS STORAGE_OUT_CODE_IDX, REQUESTER, ITEM_IDX, STORAGE_TYPE1_CODE_IDX, STORAGE_TYPE2_CODE_IDX, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_QTY, CURRENT_QTY, REQUESTER, REMARK, REG_USER, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT D.MOVEMENT_IDX, GROUP_CONCAT(D.STORAGE_NM ORDER BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, D.SEQ_CHAR) AS STORAGE_NM, GROUP_CONCAT(D.STORAGE_CODE_IDX ORDER BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, D.SEQ_CHAR) AS STORAGE_CODE_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE, nm.MOVEMENT_IDX as nmMovement_idx, nm.ITEM_IDX, nm.STORAGE_TYPE1_CODE_IDX, nm.STORAGE_TYPE2_CODE_IDX, nm.MOVEMENT_DATE, nm.MOVEMENT_QTY, nm.CURRENT_QTY, nm.REQUESTER, nm.REMARK, nm.REG_USER, nm.REG_DATE FROM (SELECT MOVEMENT_IDX, STORAGE_CODE_IDX, STORAGE_NM, PARENT_CODE, LOCATION, STORAGE_TYPE, lvl, SEQ, SEQ_CHAR FROM CTE) AS D JOIN nam_movement as nm on nm.MOVEMENT_IDX = D.movement_idx GROUP BY D.MOVEMENT_IDX, D.STORAGE_TYPE) AS E WHERE movement_idx = #{movement_idx} GROUP BY MOVEMENT_IDX ORDER BY rownum desc;
mapper.update: update nam_item_base set org_code_idx = #{org_code_idx}, possession_code_idx = #{possession_code_idx}, item_no = #{item_no}, item_detail_no = #{item_detail_no}, item_nm = #{item_nm}, item_se_nm = #{item_se_nm}, item_eng_nm = #{item_eng_nm}, author = #{author}, qty = #{qty}, qty_unit_code_idx = #{qty_unit_code_idx}, icao_code_idx = #{icao_code_idx}, existence_code_idx = #{existence_code_idx}, management_no = #{management_no}, preservation_need = #{preservation_need}, feature = #{feature}, condition_code_idx = #{condition_code_idx}, ranking_code_idx = #{ranking_code_idx}, remark = #{remark}, reg_state = #{reg_state}, mod_user = #{mod_user}, mod_date = now() where item_idx = #{item_idx}

mapper.insert: insert into nam_obtainment ( item_idx, obtainment_date, obtainment_code_idx, purchase1_code_idx, purchase2_code_idx, obtainment_price, price_unit_code_idx, won_exchange, obtainment_no, obtainment_place, obtainment_addr, obtainment_detail, record_date, designation, redemption, country_code_idx, qty, qty_unit_code_idx, redemption_date ) values ( (SELECT MAX(ITEM_IDX) FROM nam_item_base as nm), #{obt_obtainment_date}, #{obt_obtainment_code_idx}, #{obt_purchase1_code_idx}, #{obt_purchase2_code_idx}, #{obt_obtainment_price}, #{obt_price_unit_code_idx}, #{obt_won_exchange}, #{obt_obtainment_no}, #{obt_obtainment_place}, #{obt_obtainment_addr}, #{obt_obtainment_detail}, #{obt_record_date}, #{obt_designation}, #{obt_redemption}, #{obt_country_code_idx}, #{obt_qty}, #{obt_qty_unit_code_idx}, #{obt_redemption_date} )
mapper.update: update nam_obtainment set obtainment_date = #{obt_obtainment_date}, obtainment_code_idx = #{obt_obtainment_code_idx}, purchase1_code_idx = #{obt_purchase1_code_idx}, purchase2_code_idx = #{obt_purchase2_code_idx}, obtainment_price = #{obt_obtainment_price}, price_unit_code_idx = #{obt_price_unit_code_idx}, won_exchange = #{obt_won_exchange}, obtainment_no = #{obt_obtainment_no}, obtainment_place = #{obt_obtainment_place}, obtainment_addr = #{obt_obtainment_addr}, obtainment_detail = #{obt_obtainment_detail}, record_date = #{obt_record_date}, designation = #{obt_designation}, redemption = #{obt_redemption}, country_code_idx = #{obt_country_code_idx}, qty = #{obt_qty}, qty_unit_code_idx = #{obt_qty_unit_code_idx}, redemption_date = #{obt_redemption_date} where item_idx = #{item_idx}

mapper.insert:
insert into nam_movement ( item_idx, storage_type1_code_idx, storage_type2_code_idx, movement_date, movement_qty, current_qty, requester, remark, reg_user, reg_date ) values ( #{item_idx}, #{storage_type1_code_idx}, #{storage_type2_code_idx}, #{movement_date}, #{movement_qty}, #{current_qty}, #{requester}, #{remark}, #{reg_user}, now() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update nam_movement set storage_type1_code_idx = #{storage_type1_code_idx}, storage_type2_code_idx = #{storage_type2_code_idx}, movement_date = #{movement_date}, movement_qty = #{movement_qty}, current_qty = #{current_qty}, requester = #{requester}, remark = #{remark}, reg_user = #{reg_user} where movement_idx = #{movement_idx}
